reg:regulation.reg:title:
British Columbia Teachers' Council
Vacancy Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: In this regulation, Act means the Teachers Act.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Appointment to fill vacancy on British Columbia Teachers' Council
bcl:section.bcl:text: For the purposes of section 11 (10) of the Act,

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: before appointing a person to fill a vacancy, the minister must consult with the First Nations Education Authority, and
a person must meet both of the following eligibility requirements to be appointed:

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: the person must possess substantial knowledge of and experience in the First Nations education system in British Columbia;
the person must provide to the minister the person's written consent to be appointed.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Teachers Act, S.B.C. 2011, c. 19, s. 83 (2) (b.1).]
